snippet: Part of Jakks Pacific's Plug It In and Play TV Game line, the Walking Dead Zombie Hunter video game is similar to the company's Big Buck Hunter games, except this time, your quarry can eat you before you have a chance to shoot it.
abstract: Part of Jakks Pacific's Plug It In and Play TV Game line, the Walking Dead Zombie Hunter video game is similar to the company's Big Buck Hunter games, except this time, your quarry can eat you before you have a chance to shoot it.

headline.print_headline: Plug In, Take Aim and Shoot Zombies. Or Become Lunch.
